channel.title: I don't want notepad to be default anymore
channel.description:
I don't want notepad to be my default when i open my java CFG and other files.
I want it to be EditPadPro.
How do i change that?

item.title: I don't want notepad to be default anymore
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“I Hate U, post:3, topic:118376”]No i can do that i have to do that, but i want to double click click it and have it open default.[/quote]Yeah I know, but then there’s a little box which says ‘Open these kind of files with this program’.

Read full topic
item.source: I don't want notepad to be default anymore

item.title: I don't want notepad to be default anymore
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Right Click The File(s). Then Click Properties. You Should See Something Like This

Click Change And Select EditPadPro. Click OK Then Apply.

Read full topic
item.source: I don't want notepad to be default anymore

item.title: I don't want notepad to be default anymore
item.dc:creator: @I_Hate_U I Hate U
item.description:

No i can do that i have to do that, but i want to double click click it and have it open default.

item.source: I don't want notepad to be default anymore

item.title: I don't want notepad to be default anymore
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Right click the file, then click ‘Open with…’ and a box should appear. Then just choose the program you want from the list, if it’s not there click browse and find it.

Read full topic
item.source: I don't want notepad to be default anymore
